content:
:email: Let me kindly invite you to the CLAIRE Offices 2021 Opening Roadshow.

On its mission to ensure the success of ‚ÄúAI made in Europe‚Äù, CLAIRE is celebrating its reach across Europe by launching four new offices in Zurich, Oslo, Paris and Brussels in an Office Launch Roadshow. These new offices complement the four existing CLAIRE offices in The Hague, Prague, Rome and Saarbr√ºcken.

The Office Launch Roadshow will be held in a series of virtual events starting on 26 May at the new Swiss CLAIRE Office in Z√ºrich. The series continues with the Norwegian CLAIRE Office, on 03 June in Oslo, followed by the French CLAIRE Office in Paris, on 17 June, and culminates in the launch of the Belgian CLAIRE Office in Brussels, on 25 June.

:point_right: More information and registration links: https://claire-ai.org/offices-roadshow/
